tests.question1: Formula Rossa is___world`s fastest roller coaster
tests.question2: Образуйте сравнительную степень от следующих прилагательных: good, large, hot, little
tests.question4: Образуйте превосходную степень от следующих прилагательных: beautiful, far, cold, long
the most beautiful, the farest, the coldest, the longest
the beautifulest, the farthest, the coldest, the longgest
the most beautiful, the farthest, the coldest, the longest
the most beautiful, the farthest, the most cold, the longest
the most beautiful, the farthest, the coldest, the longest
